item.description:
Hi Group,

I hope you learned a great deal from John's last presentation. If you liked it, please consider attending today. The intricacies of this plan to change our Country will boggle your mind and prfoundly affect your thinking.

Revision:

NCC Bi-Weekly Meetup 23 December 2009, Merry Christmas, Everybody. Tonight John Puzzo Will Discuss the curious case of Laurel Canyon, a suburb of LA and the geographic connection between Sex ‘n Drugs ‘n Rock & Roll, revolution, and the subversion of America: Who’s behind it and why? Have YOU been infected by the Merchant’s of Cool?



Remember we have to start at 6:00 sharp and be out no later that 7:15!

Bring your ideas folks.

Thanks to everyone.

In Patriotism,

Carole
item.name: NCC Bi-Weekly Meetup - John Puzzo Will Discuss Progressivism and Laurel Canyon
